tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dataset1 (
 column1 INT,
 column2 STRING,
 column3 DATE
)

CREATE TABLE dataset_1 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    source_1_data INT
)

CREATE TABLE dataset_2 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    address VARCHAR(100),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    source_2_data FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE dataset_3 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    occupation VARCHAR(50),
    income FLOAT,
    source_3_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE combined_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    occupation VARCHAR(50),
    income FLOAT
)
